trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the size of the image on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is automatically adjusted to fit on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> while retaining the original image proportions.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否在映像的大小<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>自动调整为适合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>同时保留原始图像的比例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>属性与图像处理的各个方面。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件通过设置这些属性直接或通过设置运行-– 仅限时间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: 图像缩放由属性中的交互<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示:-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>是确定的最终图像的图像的组合按比例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>设置和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and ToolStripItemImageScaling is SizeToFit, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（默认值） 和 ToolStripItemImageScaling 是 SizeToFit，会发生任何图像缩放，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大项或规定的最小大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and ToolStripItemImageScaling is None, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和 ToolStripItemImageScaling 为 None，既不映像也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>会进行缩放。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To control the image size, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制图像大小，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the size of the image on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is not automatically adjusted to fit on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定上的映像的大小<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>不自动调整以适合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the size of the image on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is automatically adjusted to fit on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定上的映像的大小<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>自动调整为适合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>。
